transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir. Hello.
Customer: Namaste sir ji.
Executive: Namaskar baat kar raha hu aur bhi PR Patil sir maine call receive kari thi kuch din pehle yaad hoga.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aur bhi cheez ke regarding aap baat karna chahte the na?
Customer: Yes yes mere account manager ka number chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Number main aapko de raha hu aap note kar lijiye vaise maine aapko bataya tha ki aapka jo ye number se kabhi bhi call karenge na 96 wale number pe to ye jo concern open hoga wo PR Patil mein open ho jayega.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: To jab bhi aapko jarurat hogi to aap please apne us wale number se kariye ya fir aap apne account manager ko directly call kariyega. Theek hai? Main number aapko de raha hu. Ek minute rukiyega line pe rahiyega.

Executive: Rupali naam hai inka aur number main aapko de raha hu.
Customer: Rupali?
Executive: Ji Rupali naam hai inka.
Executive: Shayad meeting hui hai 14 acha last month hui thi aapke sath hai na? Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Video meeting kari hui hai inhone.
Executive: Theek hai number aap note kar lijiye sir do number hai ek main inka official number de raha hu. 080 Hmm.
Executive: 6832 6832 1335 1335 okay.
Executive: Unka isme zero laga ke call kariyega ye inka official number hai. Dusra inka personal number bhi note kar sakte hain 7488 Hmm. 35 Hmm. 6031 Okay sir.
Executive: Inke manager ka bhi number note kar lijiye agar by chance kabhi jarurat padti hai. Pehla aap inko kariye agar aapko lagta hai ki resolution nahi mil raha hai to aap inke manager ko bhi call kar sakte hain. Ek minute rukiye.

Executive: Ravi Kumar naam hai unka. Theek hai? Pehle inka official number hai 080 Hmm. 699 Hmm. 12671 Hmm. Okay. Personal number note kariye inka. 9873 Hmm. 97 Hmm. 9458 Okay sir.
Executive: Theek hai aur abhi jo aapka ye concern open hua tha ye PR Patil wale mein open hua tha. To ye main is wali company ka manager baat kar raha hu Aditya Thakur aapke account manager hain sir to ye wala theek chal raha hai PR Patil mein to koi problem nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi problem nahi hai koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: To kabhi bhi koi problem hoti hai Aditya Thakur ka number hai aapke paas jo aapke account ko handle karte hain?
Customer: Haan haan sir unka hai unka sab detail hai mere paas.
Executive: Theek hai to main ye concern aapka close kar raha hu sir. Theek hai? In call ke baad aapke paas feedback ka mail jayega to wo mere liye rahega apna sir valuable feedback de dijiyega. Theek hai? Theek hai sir theek hai thank you.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed account manager's contact number.



Resolution:

- Provided Rupali's (account manager) official and personal numbers.

- Provided Ravi Kumar's (manager) official and personal numbers.

- Confirmed Aditya Thakur is the account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the concern.

- Customer will receive a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, contact details, resolution
